snippet: The chairman of the Federal Communications Commission wants to change an $8 billion fund that subsidizes telephone service in rural areas into one that will expand broadband Internet service.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Federal Communications Commission wants to change an $8 billion fund that subsidizes telephone service in rural areas into one that will expand broadband Internet service.

headline.main: F.C.C. Plans to Overhaul Telecom Fund to Focus on Expanding Broadband
headline.print_headline: F.C.C. Plans to Overhaul Telecom Fund to Focus on Expanding Broadband
headline.seo: F.C.C. Plans to Direct More Support to Broadband
